positions.description: As a senior software developer on the Content Core and Content Platform teams I worked on:
responsibilities: Lead the design and development of migrating our Content Monolith to a decentralised Content System (Typescript, PHP), resulting in up to a 10x improvement in read latency and a decentralised system which enabled for better data governance, integrity, and ownership

Lead the design and development of the Content Event System (Azure, Typescript), a highly scalable event model which allowed for downstream services to filter and self-configure consumers to consume slim events for further processing
Lead the design and development of the V3 Go1 Content Public API (Typescript, PHP), a complete redesign of our Content Schema that focuses on a minimal and extensible model for our core data entity
Lead the design and development of the Go1 Bulk Uploader (ReactJS, Typescript), a browser application which enabled for stable long-running local jobs for content ingestion

Lead the design and development to unify how we determine content launch behaviour (Typescript, PHP), converging three seperate standards and asynchronous data ingestion schemes into one universal property
Lead the design and development to introduce Content Revisions (Typescript, PHP), a data model which enabled us to store, search and filter for content in multiple languages

positions.description: As a software developer on the Content Engineering and Content Creator teams I worked on:
responsibilities: Lead the design and development of the V2 Go1 Content API (Typscript, PHP), Go1's first Public API which enabled for Content Creation
Lead the design and development of the Go1 Content Studio (ReactJS), a creator-focused embeddable dashboard within the core platform
Migrating content repositories from Gitlab to Github
Developing data pipelines within our data lakehouse system

positions.description: As a software developer in the Core Platform and Business Glossary teams, I worked on:
accomplishments: Developed a configurable CLI tool to support in-memory database migrations to postgres
Lead the design of converting our existing JWT standards from JWS to JWE
Supervised a team of 10 during a support rotation to tackle client-facing issues

positions.description: As a junior software developer in the Core Platform team, I worked on:
responsibilities: Developed in-house SAML authentication which enabled SSO for the core product
Implemented new unit testing practices which resulted in a major uplift of front-end code coverage
Rearchitected data-intensive features which greatly improved resource usage for our analytics and search

positions.description: Utilized Tableau and python based data processing libraries to:
responsibilities: Process and analyze spatial datasets for the University's TEFMA and Go8 dashboards
Visualize spatial datasets to create official University dashboards on vacant space
Create dashboards that showcase live University prominent building data

positions.description: Utilized SQL, Tableau, and Python based data processing and visualization libraries to:
responsibilities: Identify and rectify inaccuracies and logical errors within GOWES datasets
Analyze and visualize static and geospatial patterns arising from the use of GOWES
Analyze and visualize varying types of public complaints made to the government
Conduct data maintenance by observing database usage and analyzing data integrity

education.degree: Bachelor of Science Majoring in Computing and Software Systems
